title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your romantic and social life blend together in a pleasant manner now, perhaps without any effort on your part. If youre unattached, you might spot a potential friend or partner at a social event. Similarly, you could feel enough of a magnetic boost of charisma that others are irresistibly drawn to you today. On the other hand, if youre already in an existing relationship, you both may feel in the mood to hang out with mutual friends or meet new acquaintances with whom you share a common purpose. Spontaneous escapades are always twice the fun when shared. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
